actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-48.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-48) Authorizes the expenditure of $800,000 for investigations and studies to be conducted by House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service. Stipulates that $135,000 of the total amount may be used to procure the temporary services of consultants. States that the authorization granted by this resolution shall expire on January 3, 1978.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
